sentences.sContent: So we know that the right and wrong are factitious.
sentences.sContent_eng: So we know that the right and wrong are factitious.
sentences.sCn: 而这些是非对错的标准显然都是人为的。

synos.tran: 人为的，人工的；不自然的；虚假的

remMethod.val: fact(做) + itious → 做出来的 → 人为的

trans.tranCn: 人为的, 做作的, 不自然的
trans.tranOther: made to happen artificially by people rather than happening naturally
